No dam on site - requested engineers correspondence on status and background of facility/lake. Waiting for reports, they are in progress.

Dam Safety review was carried out in lieu of a Dam Safety Inspection. The Dam Safety Review reclassified the dam to "significant" from the original classification of "high".  This changes the requirement for an EPRP.
